title: Diwali Fashion Trends For 2019
text:
, the festival of light, is a perfect celebration of all things bright. For those who love the style, Diwali gives them the right excuses to put theirfoot forward while the friends, family and loved ones come together to celebrate. If you’re wondering about theto follow, we’ve all the perfect compilation to strut in style for the glittering evenings.



These Diwali fashion trends will also help you navigate the gifting dilemma for your girl gang and lovely women of your lives. This Diwali, you can channelise your inner diva as you get to exude exuberance, glitz and glamour in the stylish latest fashion from our perfect festive picks. Want to know which Diwali trends to pick that suit your innate style? Scroll below:

Diwali Fashion Trends: Minimum Is Maximum

View this post on Instagram A post shared by Sonam K Ahuja (@sonamkapoor) on Sep 7, 2019 at 4:25am PDT

View this post on Instagram A post shared by Kriti (@kritisanon) on Jul 15, 2019 at 10:00am PDT



This Diwali, try your hands on some exhilarating minimalistic fashion. Minimalistic outfits are all the rage this season, and this Diwali, you can make the most of it. The basic principle of minimalistic fashion is to keep it simple. You can endorse a simple sari look, clubbed with natural makeup and light jewellery to mark the occasion. This Diwali fashion trend will help you keep light and would make your celebration free of fuss. And whoever said, less is more, are obviously right. Try and find out!



Tip: You can use the art of layering to add charm to your minimalistic approach. Play up your look by mixing different textures.
description: Diwali fashion trends: The glitz and glamour exuded out of traditional dresses and saris are unmatchable during this festival of light.
